name: The Voice (itch) (arsithn)
description:
Have you ever started a conversation or even argue with the voice inside your head?

Have you ever wondered how does it feel to be that voice? 

Have you ever wanted to be rich in 1 month?  

If you say yes to the last one, don't ask us we also don't know either. But if you say yes to the first two, we can give you the solution. 

Introducing, The Voice! 

An RPG unlike no other where you play as the voice inside the main character's head and make suggestion of what he should do through the game. But be careful, he's not that easy to convince especially if he doesn't really like you. Do what he asked you to do, increase your affinity, and help him become the champion!
